Blackfang: The way things are going, this renegade will come back here 
right after we jail him up, and we will follow. This planet is 
likely going to become a transformer battlefield! I'm Blackfang. From 
you design, you're autobot-generation, right?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> OOC: You assume correctly.
> 
> The bot groans and sits up, looking sheepishly at Nightlight.
> 
> "Uh, yeah, I think.  Come here often?" he quips weakly.  Now that 
the 
> immediate crisis is over with, his normal, happy-go-lucky nature is 
> returning.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: I assume that the bot landed near of Blackfang and 
Nightlight.
> > 
> > Nightlight:::
> > 
> > "Did you saw..." said Nightlight but she didn't end the phrase, 
she 
> > moved cautionsly towards the bot and some feet far of him said 
"Are 
> > you... all right?"
> >
